channel.title: Newer character stances
channel.description:
Hello, I'm trying to add new character stances. I tried looking into the playerStanceIndex integer in Player.java and thought it would be a simple animation change. I'm pretty sure it's cache related. Does anyone know how to do such a thing? If you're lost, this is what i'm trying to do:
NOTE: I DO NOT WANT THE ACTUAL CHARACTER MODEL, BUT THE WAY HE IS STANDING.
Change this:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8il3NZZ.png[/img]
to this:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/52apzr.png[/img]
Heres another example of how I want the players to stand:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j63oG0S31yo[/youtube]
Thank you!
